answers.answer: Hello!You should take multivitamin supplements containing vitamin B12 and also diet rich in minerals and vitamins. Rule out diabetes, infections and thyroid issues.Recollect if you had any past injury, blow or fall involving your left hand. If you had then you have to go for an X-ray and also follow up with an orthopedician.If you have no other issues then start physiotherapy and the numbness will decrease.If problem continues follow up with a neurologist.Take care!

question: My laft hand goes numb,but only 4 fingers go numb it even happens when I am sleeping
title: hand and finger numbness
